author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

For alignment and momentum scale studies purposes, it would be interesting to have a distilled data-tier contain the information necessary to refit tracks from V0 decays. 
This PR add a new class `AlignmentTracksFromVertexCompositeCandidateSelectorModule` which allows to isolate and save the tracks and the associated rechits used to build a `VertexCompositeCandidate`.
This is consequently used to define a new ALCARECO data-tier called `TkAlV0s` which contains the tracks and associated clusters, etc. from $K^0_s$  and p decays. 
The canonical central files for running the production of this new producer at Tier0 (target dataset `HLTPhysics`) as well as provided dedicated DQM.
A stub analyzer is also provided to study the content of the output files. 

#### PR validation:

Tested with:

```
cmsDriver.py stepReAlCa --conditions 133X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v3 -s ALCAPRODUCER:TkAlV0s,DQM:ALCARECOTkAlKShortTracksDQM+ALCARECOTkAlLambdaTracksDQM --datatier ALCARECO,DQMIO --eventcontent ALCARECO,DQM --mc --process REALCA --era Run3_2023 --scenario pp -n -1 --filein /store/relval/CMSSW_14_0_0_pre2/RelValTTbar_14TeV/GEN-SIM-RECO/133X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v3_RecoOnly-v2/2590000/085c6ebb-a997-4459-bd88-7308b6f66e3a.root --fileout file:outoput.root
```

followed by:

```
cmsDriver.py step4 -s HARVESTING:DQMNone --era Run3_2023 --conditions 133X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v3 --mc --filetype DQM --scenario pp --filein file:outoput_inDQM.root -n -1
```

and studied the DQM output.
